text: Futhi abangafungi labo abanikwe ububele phakathi kwenu nengcebo ukuthi bangabanika (usizo) abayizihlobo, abampofu kanye nabashiya amakhaya abo baye endleleni kaMvelinqangi kufanele bathethelele futhi bakhohlwe anithandi yini ukuthi uMvelinqangi anithethelele na? Futhi uMvelinqangi uyathethelela unesihawu
